text:
(TRICKSTER) You walk towards the merchant, intending to lift the money-pouch off his belt as you go past. Unfortunately you slip on a wet cobblestone and blunder right into him. "Eh!" he yells, seeing your fingers clutching his pouch. "Wha's this? Robbery! Barefaced villainy! Call the guards!"

One of the city guards, dressed in the olive-green livery of the Keep, is drinking at a tavern nearby and leaps up at once, holding out one gauntleted hand for you to stop while drawing his sword with his other.
